data.Title: Google Ends Continuous Scroll in Search Results
data.Description: Google is dropping continuous scroll in search results. Continuous scroll launched in Google mobile search in October 2021 and on desktop in December 2022.

data.Title: Google Debunks SEO Myth: Branded Keywords Won't Hurt Rankings
data.Description: Google debunks SEO myth: Using branded keywords in content doesn't harm rankings.

data.Title: Google Says Don't Avoid Mentioning Brand Names In Your Review Content
data.Description: Danny Sullivan, Google's Search Liaison, responded to some new SEO advice floating around the SEOverse that suggests you should not add the brand name of the products you are reviewing in your review content. Sullivan disagreed with this advice and said, "you shouldn't be afraid to mention the brand name of something you are reviewing."

data.Title: Google Search Showing More AI Overviews for Health Queries
data.Description: Google Search is showing more AI Overviews for health queries since pulling them back a few weeks ago.

data.Title: Google Testing AI Overviews with Link Cards at the Top
data.Description: Confirmed test from Google. Link cards AT THE TOP OF THE AI OVERVIEW. Let's see if this rolls out. :) I can't reproduce across various accounts yet, but I'll try more today.

data.Title: Google Updates Sitemap Documentation
data.Description: Google updated its sitemap document to add "The lastmod value should reflect the date and time of the last significant update to the page"

data.Title: Google: "Our Ranking Systems Aren't Perfect"
data.Description: Google's SearchLiaison acknowledged imperfections in their ranking systems and shared steps they are taking to improve search results

data.Title: Perion Network Lays Off 35 Employees
data.Description: Perion Network announced to lay off its 6% of the workforce due to cost-cutting measures. The Perion Network layoffs. announced due to Microsoft's pricing policy change, will affect around 35 employees. 📲 Perion Network Layoffs: Israel-Based Digital Ad Company to Lays Off 35 Employees Amid Cost-Cutting and Bing Search Engine’s Changed Pricing Mechanism.

data.Title: Google Analytics 4 to Replace Universal Analytics
data.Description: Just received an email from Google Analytics. Yep, UA will be gone soon. Make sure you back up your data. I exported a ton of it recently. "On July 1, 2024, Google Analytics 4 properties will have fully replaced Universal Analytics properties, as previously announced. From that…

data.Title: Google Ads Updates Search Ads Query Matching and Brand Controls
data.Description: Google Ads updates to its Search ads query matching and brand controls that made advertisers happy. Includes better reporting for misspellings, negative keywords now block misspellings, and changes to brand inclusions and brand exclusions seroundtable.com/google-ads-cha… via @adsliaison

data.Title: Google Chrome for Mobile Adds New Search Features
data.Description: Google Chrome for mobile adds new search features including local Chrome Actions, new search shortcuts, trending in search suggestions and more seroundtable.com/google-chrome-…

data.Title: Google Search Tests Sliding the Page to the Right on Entering a New Query
data.Description: Google Search tests sliding the page to the right on entering a new query seroundtable.com/google-search-… via @shemiadhikarath

data.Title: Google is Updating its Business Profile Terms of Service
data.Description: Google is updating its Business Profile terms of service

data.Title: Google June 2024 Spam Update Done Rolling Out
data.Description: The June spam update rollout is complete. What's next? Only Google knows. Muahahaha. :)
